jobDescription: GENERAL SUMMARY & SCOPE The Omnichannel Fulfillment Systems Manager will drive the project planning, deployment, and ongoing optimization of the IBM Distributed Order Management (DOM) solution. The individual will work collaboratively across the organization with internal and external partners- Fulfillment, Store Operations, Ecommerce/Digital, Merchandising, Finance, and IT- to drive the definition of requirements, cross-functional dependencies, and the development and deployment of innovative solutions in support of Ulta’s Omnichannel Fulfillment roadmap and Enterprise strategy. PRINCIPAL DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIESServe as the functional expert for the OMS/DOM solutionOwn OMS/DOM configuration and maintenanceDrive the elicitation, definition, and documentation of requirementsSupport the facilitation of design sessions with stakeholder and development teams to define solution optionsCreate, analyze, and validate detailed functional specificationsCoordinate user test case development and executionDrive issues to root cause identification and resolutionWork with various business teams to create reports and dashboards to measure and inform stakeholder teams on KPI’s and metricsCapture action items and decisions and report the information across project and stakeholder teamsDevelop and substantiate business cases to change DOM/OMS configuration or functional processContribute to the development of project plans and execution of new functionalityResponsible for creating a continuous improvement process, investigating problems, generating recommendations, and implementing solutions based on the use of analytical toolsOther duties as assigned Requirements
